thread.title: Decorate your lawn this holiday season with Jabba the Hutt
thread.title_full: Decorate your lawn this holiday season with Jabba the Hutt - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Decorate your lawn this holiday season with Jabba the Hutt
text:
ThinkGeek.com/ThinkGeek.com Six-foot-tall inflatable Jabba the Hutt for those enthusiastic about both Star Wars and curious lawn decorations. Having trouble coming up with decorations for Halloween this year? Try inflating a life-size Jabba the Hutt on your lawn this holiday season.
ThinkGeek has unveiled an officially-licensed lawn ornament resembling the most notorious gangster in the galaxy, which stands 6-feet tall and 10-feet long.
“Star Wars” fans will have to fork over $170 if they want to get this decoration.
Some customers have already requested for there to be accessories included with the Jabba the Hutt inflatable — such as a Santa hat, a pumpkin and Valentine hearts — so he can be displayed on more than one occasion.
"It's not like you have to keep him on your lawn either," ThinkGeek said on its website . "Stick him in your den. Put him in your garage. Just don't put him in your bedroom. That's creepy."
Jabba also has the ability to light up and includes a blower fan, AC adapter, 2 stakes and tether ropes.
There's a minimum age of 14 and ThinkGeek emphasizes that the Jabba the Hutt inflatable is not to be worn as a costume.
kcasino@nydailynews.com
